text: Orlando de la Torre Castro (21 November 1943 – 24 August 2022)Mundialista con Perú e ídolo de Cristal, Orlando ‘Chito’ La Torre, falleció a los 78 años was a Peruvian footballer. He played as a defender. De la Torre played for the Peru national team between 1967 and 1973.Appearances for Peru National Team - RSSSF ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Peruvian footballers
title: Orlando de la Torre
